sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.yzb790 as yzb790, a.yzb710 as yzb710, a.yzb791 as yzb791, a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb641 as yzb641, a.aae036 as aae036 FROM zb79 a WHERE 1=1
a.yzb790 = #yzb790:DOUBLE#
a.yzb710 = #yzb710:DOUBLE#
a.yzb791 = #yzb791:INTEGER#
a.yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#
a.yzb641 = #yzb641:VARCHAR#
a.aae036 = #aae036:TIMESTAMP#
SELECT a.yzb790 as yzb790, a.yzb710 as yzb710, a.yzb791 as yzb791, a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb641 as yzb641, a.aae036 as aae036 FROM zb79 a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.yzb790 = #yzb790#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO zb79 ( yzb790, yzb710, yzb791, yzb620, yzb641, aae036) VALUES ( #yzb790:DOUBLE#, #yzb710:DOUBLE#, #yzb791:INTEGER#, #yzb620:DOUBLE#, #yzb641:VARCHAR#, #aae036:TIMESTAMP#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE zb79 SET yzb710 = #yzb710:DOUBLE#, yzb791 = #yzb791:INTEGER#, yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#, yzb641 = #yzb641:VARCHAR#, WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb790 = #yzb790#

UPDATE zb79
yzb710 = #yzb710:DOUBLE#
yzb791 = #yzb791:INTEGER#
yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#
yzb641 = #yzb641:VARCHAR#
WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb790 = #yzb790#

UPDATE zb79
yzb710 = #yzb710:DOUBLE#
yzb791 = #yzb791:INTEGER#
yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#
yzb641 = #yzb641:VARCHAR#
WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb790 = #yzb790#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM zb79 WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb790 = #yzb790#
DELETE FROM zb79 WHERE 1 = 1 AND yzb710 = #yzb710#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.yzb790 as yzb790, a.yzb710 as yzb710, a.yzb791 as yzb791, a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb641 as yzb641, a.aae036 as aae036, b.yzb623 as yzb623, b.yzb624 as yzb624, b.yzb625 as yzb625, b.yzb626 as yzb626, b.yzb628 as yzb628, b.yzb62d as yzb62d, b.yzb62a as yzb62a, b.yzb62b as yzb62b, b.yzb62c as yzb62c FROM zb79 a,zb62 b WHERE 1=1 and a.yzb620 = b.yzb620
a.yzb790 = #yzb790:DOUBLE#
a.yzb710 = #yzb710:DOUBLE#
a.yzb791 = #yzb791:INTEGER#
a.yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#
a.yzb641 = #yzb641:VARCHAR#
a.aae036 = #aae036:TIMESTAMP#
SELECT a.yzb640 as yzb640, a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc FROM zb64 a WHERE a.yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a WHERE a.yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE# AND a.aae100 = '1'
a.yzb62b = #yzb62b:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62c = #yzb62c:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a WHERE a.yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE# AND a.aae100 = '1' and a.yzb62c in('1','2') ORDER BY yzb621
